subject: Re: [junit] Class-level @Rule
msgSnippet: Max, The main obstacle I m aware of right now is the committers time.  One thing that would help is clear consensus on community opinion.  There are currently
messageBody:
Max,

The main obstacle I'm aware of right now is the committers' time. One
thing that would help is clear consensus on community opinion. There
are currently two different patches mentioned in that thread--would
you be willing to make a case about which is the better solution?

David

On Wed, Apr 21, 2010 at 1:46 PM, Max Bowsher <maxb@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I'd really like to see something like
> http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/29 in JUnit. What is the
> current obstacle on integrating the code there? Can I help the process
> along at all?
>
> Thanks,
> Max.
